mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gramTimeLine (num, memberNum, content, blogNum, saveFilename, originalFilename) VALUES (seq_gramtimeline.NEXTVAL, #{memberNum}, #{content}, #{memberNum} , #{saveFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE gramTimeLine SET content=#{content} WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM duogram WHERE memberNum = #{memberNum}
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM gramtimeline g JOIN member2 m2 ON g.memberNum=m2.memberNum
SELECT num, m2.name, g.memberNum, blogNum, content, created FROM gramtimeline g JOIN member2 m2 ON g.memberNum=m2.memberNum WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gramreply(replyNum, num, content, answer, writer) VALUES(seq_gramreply.NEXTVAL, #{num}, #{content}, #{answer}, #{writer})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM gramreply WHERE num=#{num} AND answer=0

SELECT replyNum, p.num, p.content, p.created, answer, m2.name, p.writer FROM gramreply p JOIN gramtimeline g ON p.Num=g.Num JOIN member2 m2 ON m2.memberNum=g.memberNum WHERE g.num=#{num} ORDER BY replyNum DESC
